links.*: Of the Sun and Moon and the Hiding of Valinor

wikitext.*:
'''Spirits of shadows''' were servants of [[Morgoth]], who he sent against [[Tilion]] and the vessel of the [[Moon]]. There was a strife in [[Ilmen]], but Tilion was victorious against these evil [[spirits]].<ref>{{S|Sun}}</ref>
